attributes.action: press the Canadian Government to allow tax breaks on imported classic British vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Seeing classic cars being used can lift the community spirit and, through providing their owners an outlet for their stress, actually offer positive health benefits.  At present the Candian Government is not doing all it can to assist its citizens enjoy this pass-time and should be pressed to do so.  As the classic car world is made up of a significant proportion of British cars this would strengthen our export links with Canada and would help my mate Kevin get his hands on the Land-Rover Series 1 he so badly needs.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
